name: Napa County Library Databases
description: Free access to research databases and digital resources with Napa County library card
fullDescription: Napa County Library provides free access to research databases and digital resources for all cardholders.
whatTheyOffer:
- Research databases
- Ebooks and audiobooks
- Digital magazines and newspapers
- Learning resources
- Consumer and business information
- Genealogy databases
howToGetIt:
1. Get a Napa County Library card (free for residents)
2. Visit the library's databases page
3. Browse available resources
4. Sign in with your library card
5. Access content on any device
